intro: Nectalisma, commonly known as the sweetleaf plant, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Malvaceae. It is characterized by its palmate leaves and showy, clustered flowers that range in color from white to pink. The plant is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa and Asia. Nectalisma species are often cultivated for their ornamental value and are also used in traditional medicine. The fruit of the plant contains a sweet, edible pulp that is sometimes consumed by local populations.
